Package com.canoo.platform.server.spi

This package contains the SPI for Dolphin Platform server modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationProvider
    A provider for configuration properties.
    ServerCoreComponents
    Facade to all global server components that are provided by the Dolphin Platform
    ServerModule
    This interface defines a server module that will automatically be started when the Dolphin Platform server component starts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBaseModule
    Abstract implementation of the ServerModule interface that can be used as a base to create new server module implementations.
    ConfigurationProviderAdapter
    A simple implementation of ConfigurationProvider that can be used as a base for a custom implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ModuleInitializationException
    Exception that will be thrown if a module can not be initialized.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ModuleDefinition
    Annotation to define a module.

Package com.canoo.platform.server.spi Description

This package contains the SPI for Dolphin Platform server modules. All modules that are based on this API and are at the classpath at the server start will be automatically loaded and started. A module is defined by a ServerModule implementation and must be annotated by ModuleDefinition. All modules will be loaded by the default Java SPI implementation. See ServiceLoader for more information.
Author:
Hendrik Ebbers
See Also:
ServerModule, ModuleDefinition, ServiceLoader
